job.title: Clinical Research Coordinator
job.description: <p><strong>Hours: M-F -40 Hours a week!</strong></p><p><strong>Contract: 6 Months&nbsp;&nbsp;</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>JOB DETAILS:</strong>&nbsp;</p><p>Data Entry, Administrative needs - i.e. Filing, set-up for upcoming appts, organizing documentation. Study Coordinator experience, takes initiative and jump into busy site - full scope of recruitment to retention, good communicator.</p><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>REQUIRED:&nbsp;</strong></p><ul><li>Prior clinical research or research experience</li><li>Experience speaking with patients and coordinating documents/appointment scheduling and handling of medical records</li><li>EDC Data Entry experience</li></ul>
